about_the_game:
A cowardly goose against the whole dinosaur power mafia.

During the adventure of defeating the dinosaur power mafia and rescuing their friends, Cleto and Mr. PG make a small stopover to free the Cacomixtles, because through trickery they were captured by the terrible Chilaquiles Gordoba, putting the whole region at risk, as the Cacomixtle family prevents the plagues from invading the land.
Languages: Spanish and English.
detailed_description:
A cowardly goose against the whole dinosaur power mafia.

During the adventure of defeating the dinosaur power mafia and rescuing their friends, Cleto and Mr. PG make a small stopover to free the Cacomixtles, because through trickery they were captured by the terrible Chilaquiles Gordoba, putting the whole region at risk, as the Cacomixtle family prevents the plagues from invading the land.
Languages: Spanish and English.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Help Mr. PG and Cleto the goose to free the Cacomixtles from the hands of the terrible Chilaquiles Gordoba, who by trickery has captured them, putting the farmland at risk of being invaded by the plague. Fight to free them in this 90's style beat em up videogame.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
